post.title: fs: bnib iphone4 16gb lnib iphone 4 32gb rogers locked gta
post.content: selling two brand new iphone4's, the 16gb is sealed, the 32gb has been opened activated and a screen protector has been applied. took a quick picture of the two phones with my blackberry. 16gb: $850 32gb: $1100 prices are pretty firm. phones don't need to be sold. interested in trading a bnib rogers blackberry 9700+ cash for the 16gb. thats about it. will meet up within the central gta. cheers
